Description: Construction workforce management platform with AI-powered payroll, time tracking, and job costing automation for contractors
Custom data integration platform using AI to automatically transform data between any schemas using natural language commands
Fiber-optic sensing technology leveraging AI for real-time infrastructure monitoring and event detection in telecom networks
Short-form video and social platform for sports content, reactions, and news sharing with audio response features
Wearable AI microphone pendant that passively listens to conversations and provides real-time insights and transcriptions
